translations: 修道院的；僧尼的；庙宇的

sentences.sentence: He was drawn to the monastic life.
Peter, as Lindsey Hughes has argued, was highly suspicious of any alternative to state service, especially the monastic way of life.
sentences.translation: 正如林赛·休斯所说的那样，彼得对任何以其他方式服务国家的行为都非常怀疑，尤其是修道院的生活方式。

sentences.sentence: It is equally possible that the work survived far into the Middle Ages in numerous copies in monastic libraries but were unnoticed due to lack of interest.
sentences.translation: 这些作品同样可能在修道院图书馆中以数不清的数量存活到中世纪，但由于缺乏兴趣而未被注意。
